result.execSummary:
The defendant Carl Lee McAdory was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Carl Lee McAdory is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Carl Lee McAdory was found guilty of Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (8th), a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(am).
  • Carl Lee McAdory was found guilty of Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).
  • Carl Lee McAdory was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Activity: Sentencing hearing 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

10:15 AM Defendant Carl Lee McAdory in court by video in custody with attorney Kelly James Mattingly in person. Cheniqua White appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives right to appear in person in courtroom. Defendant waives update to PSI. Count 1 is dismissed on motion of the State. On count 2, Court orders 3 years prison and 6 years extended supervision. Defendant is eligible for Substance Abuse Program but not eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program. Court orders 3 years driver's license revocation and 3 years IID.  Complete AODA and all treatment/counseling as necessary. Costs DOC collect. Sentence credit 1085 days. Sentences previously ordered on counts 3 and 4 to remain.

Court grants motion to reinstate bond.  Cash bond set of $2500 with conditions.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Cannot operate a motor vehicle during the pendency of this case.  Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. Court orders Judgment of Conviction be amended to remove conviction on count 1 in compliance with decision from Court of Appeals. Court to issue written decision on count 2. Matter to be set.

9:16 AM Defendant Carl Lee McAdory in court in custody with attorney Stephen M Compton.  Cheniqua White appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State moves to Dismiss Count 2- Court orders Count 2 Dismissed. Court orders Count 1- 9 Years; 4 years Prison and 5 Years Extended Supervision with Conditions, 3 years IID and 3 years DL Revoked,   Complete AODA and all treatment/counseling as necessary, maintain Absolute Sobriety, Not to possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription, and not to be in any bars, taverns, or any establishments where liquor is a primary source of revenue. Court orders Count 3 and 4- Sentence withheld; 2 years probation consecutive to Count one but concurrent with each other. All costs are DOC to collect-Bond to apply. 158 Days Credit.
